rental_system

Class RentalSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • rental_system.RentalSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RentalSystem2

    public class RentalSystem
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Rental system of cars. System has cars and registered customers. Customer can rent a car for some number of days.
    Author:
    Donatas Kuƒçinskas
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
